ModMetaData.name: Death Stranding Factions - MULEs
ModMetaData.author: HIGGS
ModMetaData.description:
This is the second strand-type mod.
Death Stranding Factions: MULEs The MULEs, also called Homo gestalts due to their irrational obession with their profession, are a faction of cargo thieves that ambush traders on deliveries or infiltrating their camps. They suffer from a condition known as porter syndrome and seek primarily to steal the cargo of others.
Mod Adds: • 1 Faction (MULEs) and Scenario • 1 Weapon (Porter Prod) • 4 Attires (Outfit, Overcoat, Torso Armor, Balaclava, and Hooded Balaclava)
This mod is Combat Extended Compatible. No patches needed.
Langues Currently Available: English
If you want to make a language pack added, feel free to comment with a link. Will be credited for the contribution.
Credits: HIGGS - Art and Coding Chicken Plucker - Initial Coding Help Discord User: Tostov - Coding Help Discord Members - Coding and Emotional Support Hideo Kojima - Death Stranding
